text:
[Verse]
Walking down the street
Lights are shining bright
Feels like a dream
In the cool of night

[Verse 2]
Shadows on the walls
Whispers in the air
Taking it all in
Without a single care

[Chorus]
Under the moonlight
Everything's alright
Dancing with the stars
Together near or far

[Verse 3]
Heart is beating fast
Moments never last
Holding on to you
So much left to do

[Bridge]
Night will turn to day
But right now I'll stay
In this magic phase
Lost in your gaze

[Chorus]
Under the moonlight
Everything's alright
Dancing with the stars
Together near or far
title: Under the Moonlight
